ModMetaData.name: RimServers
ModMetaData.author: Ninoss
ModMetaData.description:
Adds a set of server racks for your colony.
- Makeshift server: early-game research boost. - Band node server: increases mechanitor bandwidth (Biotech required). - Research servers: research boost to research benches. - Commercial servers: periodically produce silver.
All servers require power and most generate heat.
Inspired by: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1714455977.
